## AssociationDefinition.sourceMandatoryEnforced property

If the mandatoryness of the source of the association is enforced.

If true, data updates that would violate the requirement from [AssociationDefinition.sourceMandatory](./alfresco-data-model.associationdefinition.sourcemandatory.md) will be rejected.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly sourceMandatoryEnforced: boolean;
```
